articles.title: Haverhill police chief retires amid no confidence vote, criticism after officer’s death
articles.description:

articles.title: Fraser Minten scores in overtime to lift the Bruins past the Blackhawks, 4-3
articles.description:
Minten converted on a 2-on-1 break for his first career overtime goal, giving the Bruins their second straight victory under new head coach Marco Sturm.

articles.title: Pro-Palestine protesters arrested after clash with police now facing felony charges, including inciting a riot
articles.description:
The charges of inciting a riot — a felony — are being brought under a state law that prohibits the "promotion of anarchy."
